messages.message: What potential UX drawbacks could arise from disabling the CDN? Considering it has been in use for a long time, are we confident about implementing this change?
I imagine our customers will much appreciate our UI not blank-screening on them due to minor misconfigurations. :slightly_smiling_face: :+1::skin-tone-3:

The potential UX drawbacks is just longer load time, but I personally found it to be not so significant (for example, around the load time for aihub-sandbox, uat and preprod).

I believe when we set this up we expected significant community usage from India as a result of the hackathons and local promotions. Given that we never reached the scale expected, the CDN was not really necessary and the misconfiguration from time to time causing blank screening is a bigger problem.
